game.title: Defeat the Dark Lord's Lieutenant
game.objective: Kill Xarath, the Dark Lord's most trusted lieutenant.
game.description: The dark lord has sent his most powerful lieutenant to take over the land. Defeat him and save the people from his tyranny.
game.reward: 10 Gold Pieces and a Magical Sword

task.description: The lieutenant's castle is located on a hill overlooking the land. Be careful not to get caught in his traps.
The lieutenant has many minions guarding the castle. Defeat them to get closer to your goal.
The final battle is against the lieutenant himself. Be prepared for a tough fight.
